-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | haskell implementation of RESP (REdis Serialization Protocol).
--   
@package hRESP
@version 0.1.0.0

module Database.Redis.RESP

-- | Representation of reply and request.
data Reply
SingleLine :: ByteString -> Reply
Error :: ByteString -> Reply
Integer :: Integer -> Reply
Bulk :: (Maybe ByteString) -> Reply
MultiBulk :: (Maybe [Reply]) -> Reply
renderReply :: Reply -> ByteString
parseReply :: Parser Reply
newtype Request
Request :: [ByteString] -> Request
renderRequest :: Request -> ByteString
parseRequest :: Parser Request
instance Eq Reply
instance Show Reply
